tactical_trooper.name: Tactical Trooper
tactical_trooper.description: Sometimes performs 2 actions in a row. The number of actions is not affected if you don't issue specific orders. Very slightly lowers the monster's attributes.

tactical_commander.name: Tactical Commander
tactical_commander.description: Performs 2 actions in a row. The number of actions is not affected if you don't issue specific orders. Slightly lowers the monster's attributes.

tactical_genius.name: Tactical Genius
tactical_genius.description: Sometimes performs 2 or 3 actions in a row. The number of actions is not affected if you don't issue specific orders. Slightly lowers the monster's attributes.

tactical_titan.name: Tactical Titan
tactical_titan.description: Performs 2 or 3 actions in a row. The number of actions is not affected if you don't issue specific orders. Lowers the monster's attributes.

insta_oomph.name: Insta-Oomph
insta_oomph.description: Monster sometimes casts Oomph on itself at the start of battle.

insta_buff.name: Insta-Buff
insta_buff.description: Monster sometimes casts Buff on itself at the start of battle.

insta_accel.name: Insta-Accel
insta_accel.description: Monster sometimes casts Accelerate on itself at the start of battle.

insta_ping.name: Insta-Ping
insta_ping.description: Monster sometimes casts Ping on itself at the start of battle.

insta_bounce.name: Insta-Bounce
insta_bounce.description: Monster sometimes casts Bounce on itself at the start of battle.

rando_oomph.name: Rando-Oomph
rando_oomph.description: Monster sometimes casts Oomph on itself during battle.

rando_buff.name: Rando-Buff
rando_buff.description: Monster sometimes casts Buff on itself during battle.

rando_accel.name: Rando-Accel
rando_accel.description: Monster sometimes casts Accelerate on itself during battle.

rando_ping.name: Rando-Ping
rando_ping.description: Monster sometimes casts Ping on itself during battle.

rando_mister.name: Rando-Mister
rando_mister.description: Monster sometimes uses Mist Me on itself during battle.

rando_relief.name: Rando-Relief
rando_relief.description: Sometimes uses Wave of Relief during battle.

rando_panic.name: Rando-Panic
rando_panic.description: Sometimes uses Wave of Panic during battle.

rando_disrupt.name: Rando-Disrupt
rando_disrupt.description: Sometimes uses Disruptive Wave during battle.

rando_muster.name: Rando-Muster
rando_muster.description: Sometimes uses Muster Strength during battle.

low_heal.name: Low Heal
low_heal.description: Sometimes restores 30 or more HP to all allies during battle. Higher wisdom makes the healing effect more powerful.

high_heal.name: High Heal
high_heal.description: Sometimes restores 80 or more HP to all allies during battle. Higher wisdom makes the healing effect more powerful.

wizardly_wind.name: Wizardly Wind
wizardly_wind.description: Sometimes restores 5 or more MP to all allies during battle. A higher level increases the restored amount.

last_gasp.name: Last Gasp
last_gasp.description: Revives a single ally after it falls in battle. Only works once per battle.

frizzmeister.name: Frizzmeister
frizzmeister.description: Increases the potency of fire-elemental attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

splishmeister.name: Splishmeister
splishmeister.description: Increases the potency of water-elemental attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

wooshmeister.name: Wooshmeister
wooshmeister.description: Increases the potency of wind-elemental attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

cragmeister.name: Cragmeister
cragmeister.description: Increases the potency of earth-elemental attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

bangmeister.name: Bangmeister
bangmeister.description: Increases the potency of explosive attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

crackmeister.name: Crackmeister
crackmeister.description: Increases the potency of ice-elemental attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

zapmeister.name: Zapmeister
zapmeister.description: Increases the potency of electrical attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

sizzmeister.name: Sizzmeister
sizzmeister.description: Increases the potency of light-elemental attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

zammeister.name: Zammeister
zammeister.description: Increases the potency of dark-elemental attacks and decreases their MP consumption.

health_professional.name: Health Professional
health_professional.description: Increases the potency of healing skills and decreases their MP consumption.

metal_skin.name: Metal Skin
metal_skin.description: Reduces damage received by 1/3, but doubles the MP consumption of spells and abilities.

slick_skin.name: Slick Skin
slick_skin.description: Sometimes causes incoming direct attacks to miss.

spiky_skin.name: Spiky Skin
spiky_skin.description: Returns 1/4 of the damage suffered from direct attacks back at the attacking enemy.

infected_skin.name: Infected Skin
infected_skin.description: Sometimes poisons enemies that inflict direct attacks.

stunning_skin.name: Stunning Skin
stunning_skin.description: Sometimes stuns enemies that inflict direct attacks for 1 turn.

somnolent_skin.name: Somnolent Skin
somnolent_skin.description: Sometimes puts enemies that inflict direct attacks to sleep.

stupefying_skin.name: Stupefying Skin
stupefying_skin.description: Sometimes confuses enemies that inflict direct attacks.

insensitive_skin.name: Insensitive Skin
insensitive_skin.description: Sometimes paralyses enemies that inflict direct attacks.

spongy_skin.name: Spongy Skin
spongy_skin.description: Sometimes absorbs MP from enemies that inflict direct attacks.

artful_dodger.name: Artful Dodger
artful_dodger.description: Makes it slightly easier to avoid enemy attacks.

ace_evader.name: Ace Evader
ace_evader.description: Makes it somewhat easier to avoid enemy attacks.

supreme_sidestepper.name: Supreme Sidestepper
supreme_sidestepper.description: Makes it much easier to avoid enemy attacks.

dodge_denier.name: Dodge Denier
dodge_denier.description: Ensures the enemy cannot avoid attacks.

critical_triumph.name: Critical Triumph
critical_triumph.description: Makes it somewhat easier to inflict critical hits.

critical_sensation.name: Critical Sensation
critical_sensation.description: Makes it much easier to inflict critical hits.

critical_moment.name: Critical Moment
critical_moment.description: Makes it easier to inflict critical hits when HP drops to 1/2, and even more so when HP drops to 1/4.

critical_theorist.name: Critical Theorist
critical_theorist.description: Makes it somewhat easier to cast critical spells.

critical_mastermind.name: Critical Mastermind
critical_mastermind.description: Makes it much easier to cast critical spells.

magical_moment.name: Magical Moment
magical_moment.description: Makes it easier to cast critical spells when HP drops to 1/2, and even more so when HP drops to 1/4.

desperate_measures.name: Desperate Measures
desperate_measures.description: Negates all damage suffered from critical hits and critical spells.

hothead.name: Hothead
hothead.description: Makes it easier to activate a frenzied state, turning the monster into a formidable fighting force.

auto_restora.name: Auto-Restora
auto_restora.description: Restores a small amount of HP after each action.

auto_cadabra.name: Auto-Cadabra
auto_cadabra.description: Restores a small amount of MP after each action.

dragonsbane.name: Dragonsbane
dragonsbane.description: Increases damage inflicted on monsters from the dragon family and slightly lowers all resistances.

beastsbane.name: Beastsbane
beastsbane.description: Increases damage inflicted on monsters from the beast family and slightly lowers all resistances.

naturesbane.name: Naturesbane
naturesbane.description: Increases damage inflicted on monsters from the nature family and slightly lowers all resistances.

demonsbane.name: Demonsbane
demonsbane.description: Increases damage inflicted on monsters from the demon family and slightly lowers all resistances.

zombiesbane.name: Zombiesbane
zombiesbane.description: Increases damage inflicted on monsters from the undead family and slightly lowers all resistances.

matterbane.name: Matterbane
matterbane.description: Increases damage inflicted on monsters from the material family and slightly lowers all resistances.

bossesbane.name: Bossesbane
bossesbane.description: Increases damage inflicted on monsters from the ??? family and slightly lowers all resistances.

uber_slimesbane.name: Über Slimesbane
uber_slimesbane.description: Greatly increases damage inflicted on monsters from the slime family and somewhat lowers all resistances.

uber_dragonsbane.name: Über Dragonsbane
uber_dragonsbane.description: Greatly increases damage inflicted on monsters from the dragon family and somewhat lowers all resistances.

uber_beastsbane.name: Über Beastsbane
uber_beastsbane.description: Greatly increases damage inflicted on monsters from the beast family and somewhat lowers all resistances.

uber_naturesbane.name: Über Naturesbane
uber_naturesbane.description: Greatly increases damage inflicted on monsters from the nature family and somewhat lowers all resistances.

uber_demonsbane.name: Über Demonsbane
uber_demonsbane.description: Greatly increases damage inflicted on monsters from the demon family and somewhat lowers all resistances.

uber_zombiesbane.name: Über Zombiesbane
uber_zombiesbane.description: Greatly increases damage inflicted on monsters from the undead family and somewhat lowers all resistances.

uber_matterbane.name: Über Matterbane
uber_matterbane.description: Greatly increases damage inflicted on monsters from the material family and somewhat lowers all resistances.

poisonous_touch.name: Poisonous Touch
poisonous_touch.description: Regular attacks sometimes poison the enemy.

stunning_touch.name: Stunning Touch
stunning_touch.description: Regular attacks sometimes stun the enemy for 1 turn.

sleepy_touch.name: Sleepy Touch
sleepy_touch.description: Regular attacks sometimes put the enemy to sleep.

confusing_touch.name: Confusing Touch
confusing_touch.description: Regular attacks sometimes confuse the enemy.

paralysing_touch.name: Paralysing Touch
paralysing_touch.description: Regular attacks sometimes paralyse the enemy.

deadly_touch.name: Deadly Touch
deadly_touch.description: Regular attacks sometimes kill the enemy instantly.

miraculous_touch.name: Miraculous Touch
miraculous_touch.description: Regular attacks restore 1/2 of the damage they inflict on the enemy as HP.

absorbent_touch.name: Absorbent Touch
absorbent_touch.description: Regular attacks sometimes absorb a portion of the enemy's MP.

metal_beater.name: Metal Beater
metal_beater.description: Inflicts additional damage on enemies. A higher level increases the effect. Works on enemies with the Metal Skin trait.

metal_medley.name: Metal Medley
metal_medley.description: Ignores the damage-reducing effect that the Metal Skin trait provides.

little_menace.name: Little Menace
little_menace.description: Increases damage inflicted on S-size monsters.

big_bully.name: Big Bully
big_bully.description: Increases damage inflicted on L-size monsters.

insult_to_injury.name: Insult to Injury
insult_to_injury.description: Increases damage inflicted on enemies that are poisoned, severely poisoned, stunned, asleep, confused or paralysed.

intimidating.name: Intimidating
intimidating.description: Sometimes stuns the enemy during battle for 1 turn.

strangely_alluring.name: Strangely Alluring
strangely_alluring.description: Sometimes stuns the enemy during battle for 1 turn.

agent_of_chaos.name: Agent of Chaos
agent_of_chaos.description: Always attacks an enemy when the monster is confused. Successful strikes inflict critical hits.

sleep_twitch.name: Sleep Twitch
sleep_twitch.description: Attacks all enemies when the monster is asleep

static_discharge.name: Static Discharge
static_discharge.description: Sometimes paralyses enemies that inflict direct attacks when the monster is paralysed itself.

sobering_slap.name: Sobering Slap
sobering_slap.description: Sometimes cures allies of sleep and confusion during battle.

detox.name: Detox
detox.description: Sometimes cures allies of poison, severe poison and paralysis during battle.

decontaminate.name: Decontaminate
decontaminate.description: Sometimes cures allies of sleep, confusion, poison, severe poison and paralysis during battle.

heaven_sent.name: Heaven-Sent
heaven_sent.description: Sometimes greatly increases attack, defence, agility or wisdom during battle.

bigger_upper.name: Bigger Upper
bigger_upper.description: Extends the duration of skills that raise the strength, defence, agility or wisdom of allies to 5 turns. In addition, randomly grants invincibility, the ability to reflect spells or breath attacks, or raises evasion.

major_downer.name: Major Downer
major_downer.description: Extends the duration of skills that lower the strength, defence, agility or wisdom of enemies to 5 turns. In addition, randomly prevents breath attacks, critical hits or the casting of magic, or bedazzles the enemy.

close_scraper.name: Close Scraper
close_scraper.description: Sometimes allows the monster to survive at 1 HP after suffering an attack that would otherwise kill it.

last_legs.name: Last Legs
last_legs.description: Allows the monster to survive at 1 HP after suffering an attack that would otherwise kill it.

snappy_comeback.name: Snappy Comeback
snappy_comeback.description: Inflicts damage back on an enemy that lands a killer blow. The amount inflicted is proportional to the excess damage suffered after the monster's HP are reduced to zero.

parting_gift.name: Parting Gift
parting_gift.description: Inflicts damage back on all enemies when a killer blow is received. The amount inflicted is proportional to the excess damage suffered after the monster's HP are reduced to zero.

benefaction.name: Benefaction
benefaction.description: Massively increases the attack, defence, agility and wisdom of allies when a killer blow is received.

strong_starter.name: Strong Starter
strong_starter.description: Raises damage inflicted on enemies up to round 3, but lowers it from round 4 onwards.

late_bloomer.name: Late Bloomer
late_bloomer.description: Increases attack, defence, agility and wisdom from round 3 onwards, and even more so from round 6.

tit_for_tat.name: Tit for Tat
tit_for_tat.description: When a monster is inflicted with a status ailment, the attacking enemy will have the same ailment inflicted back on them.

naked_ambition.name: Naked Ambition
naked_ambition.description: Increases the likelihood of critical hits and critical spells if no accessory is equipped.

attacking_impulse.name: Attacking Impulse
attacking_impulse.description: Increases damage inflicted when HP drop to 1/2.

defensive_impulse.name: Defensive Impulse
defensive_impulse.description: Reduces damage received when HP drop to 1/2.

evasive_impulse.name: Evasive Impulse
evasive_impulse.description: Sometimes increases evasion and greatly increases agility during battle when HP has dropped to 1/2. Only activates once per battle.

unhealthy_advantage.name: Unhealthy Advantage
unhealthy_advantage.description: Inflicts increasing amounts of damage as remaining HP gets lower.

collective_punishment.name: Collective Punishment
collective_punishment.description: Attacks that do more damage as the attack attribute increases will strike all enemies instead of a single target.

personal_grudge.name: Personal Grudge
personal_grudge.description: Greatly decreases the attack, defence, agility and wisdom of an enemy that lands a killer blow, and stuns them for the next turn.

echonomist.name: Echonomist
echonomist.description: Sometimes casts the same spell twice. Consumes slightly more MP than usual.

adrenaline_rush.name: Adrenaline Rush
adrenaline_rush.description: Greatly increases attack after inflicting a critical hit.

trance_state.name: Trance State
trance_state.description: Greatly increases wisdom after casting a critical spell.

iota_of_experience.name: Iota of Experience
iota_of_experience.description: Slightly increases the amount of experience points earned after battle.

gold_planner.name: Gold Planner
gold_planner.description: Slightly increases the amount of gold coins acquired from battle.

rummager.name: Rummager
rummager.description: Slightly increases the likelihood of acquiring an item from battle.

scavenger.name: Scavenger
scavenger.description: Somewhat increases the likelihood of acquiring an item from battle.

ultra_crafty_frizzer.name: Ultra Crafty Frizzer
ultra_crafty_frizzer.description: Greatly increases the damage inflicted by fire-elemental attacks.

ultra_crafty_splasher.name: Ultra Crafty Splasher
ultra_crafty_splasher.description: Greatly increases the damage inflicted by water-elemental attacks.

ultra_crafty_woosher.name: Ultra Crafty Woosher
ultra_crafty_woosher.description: Greatly increases the damage inflicted by wind-elemental attacks.

ultra_crafty_cragger.name: Ultra Crafty Cragger
ultra_crafty_cragger.description: Greatly increases the damage inflicted by earth-elemental attacks.

ultra_crafty_banger.name: Ultra Crafty Banger
ultra_crafty_banger.description: Greatly increases the damage inflicted by explosive attacks.

crafty_cracker.name: Crafty Cracker
crafty_cracker.description: Slightly increases the damage inflicted by ice-elemental attacks.

ultra_crafty_cracker.name: Ultra Crafty Cracker
ultra_crafty_cracker.description: Greatly increases the damage inflicted by ice-elemental attacks.

ultra_crafty_zapper.name: Ultra Crafty Zapper
ultra_crafty_zapper.description: Greatly increases the damage inflicted by electrical attacks.

ultra_crafty_sizzer.name: Ultra Crafty Sizzer
ultra_crafty_sizzer.description: Greatly increases the damage inflicted by light-elemental attacks.

ultra_crafty_zammer.name: Ultra Crafty Zammer
ultra_crafty_zammer.description: Greatly increases the damage inflicted by dark-elemental attacks.

ultra_crafty_debilitator.name: Ultra Crafty Debilitator
ultra_crafty_debilitator.description: Makes it much easier to reduce an enemy's attack, defence, agility or wisdom.

ultra_crafty_dazzler.name: Ultra Crafty Dazzler
ultra_crafty_dazzler.description: Makes it much easier to bedazzle enemies.

ultra_crafty_spellbinder.name: Ultra Crafty Spellbinder
ultra_crafty_spellbinder.description: Makes it much easier to prevent spellcasting

ultra_crafty_magic_drainer.name: Ultra Crafty Magic Drainer
ultra_crafty_magic_drainer.description: Makes it much easier to absorb MP.

ultra_crafty_confuser.name: Ultra Crafty Confuser
ultra_crafty_confuser.description: Makes it much easier to the enemy.

ultra_crafty_sleeper.name: Ultra Crafty Sleeper
ultra_crafty_sleeper.description: Makes it much easier to put the enemy to sleep.

ultra_crafty_paralyser.name: Ultra Crafty Paralyser
ultra_crafty_paralyser.description: Makes it much easier to paralyse the enemy.

ultra_crafty_stunner.name: Ultra Crafty Stunner
ultra_crafty_stunner.description: Makes it much easier to stun the enemy.

ultra_crafty_poisoner.name: Ultra Crafty Poisoner
ultra_crafty_poisoner.description: Makes it much easier to poison or severely poison the enemy.

ultra_crafty_whacker.name: Ultra Crafty Whacker
ultra_crafty_whacker.description: Makes it much easier to kill the enemy instantly.

crafty_devil.name: Crafty Devil
crafty_devil.description: Makes it moderately easier to inflict status ailments on the enemy.

frizz_ward.name: Frizz Ward
frizz_ward.description: Slightly increases resistance to fire-elemental attacks.

ultra_frizz_ward.name: Ultra Frizz Ward
ultra_frizz_ward.description: Greatly increases resistance to fire-elemental attacks.

splish_ward.name: Splish Ward
splish_ward.description: Slightly increases resistance to water-elemental attacks.

ultra_splish_ward.name: Ultra Splish Ward
ultra_splish_ward.description: Greatly increases resistance to water-elemental attacks.

woosh_ward.name: Woosh Ward
woosh_ward.description: Slightly increases resistance to wind-elemental attacks.

ultra_woosh_ward.name: Ultra Woosh Ward
ultra_woosh_ward.description: Greatly increases resistance to wind-elemental attacks.

crag_ward.name: Crag Ward
crag_ward.description: Slightly increases resistance to earth-elemental attacks.

ultra_crag_ward.name: Ultra Crag Ward
ultra_crag_ward.description: Greatly increases resistance to earth-elemental attacks.

bang_ward.name: Bang Ward
bang_ward.description: Slightly increases resistance to explosive attacks.

ultra_bang_ward.name: Ultra Bang Ward
ultra_bang_ward.description: Greatly increases resistance to explosive attacks.

crack_ward.name: Crack Ward
crack_ward.description: Slightly increases resistance to ice-elemental attacks.

ultra_crack_ward.name: Ultra Crack Ward
ultra_crack_ward.description: Greatly increases resistance to ice-elemental attacks.

zap_ward.name: Zap Ward
zap_ward.description: Slightly increases resistance to electrical attacks.

ultra_zap_ward.name: Ultra Zap Ward
ultra_zap_ward.description: Greatly increases resistance to electrical attacks.

sizz_ward.name: Sizz Ward
sizz_ward.description: Slightly increases resistance to light-elemental attacks.

ultra_sizz_ward.name: Ultra Sizz Ward
ultra_sizz_ward.description: Greatly increases resistance to light-elemental attacks.

zam_ward.name: Zam Ward
zam_ward.description: Slightly increases resistance to dark-elemental attacks.

ultra_zam_ward.name: Ultra Zam Ward
ultra_zam_ward.description: Greatly increases resistance to dark-elemental attacks.

antitoxidant.name: Antitoxidant
antitoxidant.description: Slightly increases resistance to poison and severe poison.

ultra_antitoxidant.name: Ultra Antitoxidant
ultra_antitoxidant.description: Greatly increases resistance to poison and severe poison.

granite_chin.name: Granite Chin
granite_chin.description: Slightly increases resistance to being stunned.

ultra_granite_chin.name: Ultra Granite Chin
ultra_granite_chin.description: Greatly increases resistance to being stunned.

insomniac.name: Insomniac
insomniac.description: Slightly increases resistance to being put to sleep.

ultra_insomniac.name: Ultra Insomniac
ultra_insomniac.description: Greatly increases resistance to being put to sleep.

death_defier.name: Death Defier
death_defier.description: Slightly increases resistance to instant death.

ultra_death_defier.name: Ultra Death Defier
ultra_death_defier.description: Greatly increases resistance to instant death.

ultra_drain_blocker.name: Ultra Drain Blocker
ultra_drain_blocker.description: Greatly increases resistance to MP absorption.
